review: I love my Amazon Fire stick. It is so easy to use.
author: Jean Mewbourn

review: Just had the opportunity to try the mirroring function on a Netflix Show - Very pleased, the show ran without interruption, good to great picture & sound.  Will use again.
author: Dean E. Turner

review: Performed as I expected. Which very easy to install and I am enjoying its use now.
author: Dennis nishida

review: Awesome!! Wish I had bought it sooner and for only $39 it's way cheaper than upgrading to a smart tv when mine works fine. Highly recommend!
author: Gabriella Herrera

review: Finally cut the cord ans happy. Netflix and Hulu are an easy download and Amazon Prime offers lots of content.
author: Charlene
